title: The Damnwells Complete Discography and Live Shows
description:
This torrent is a complete Discography as well as a large collection of LIVE sets by the Damnwells. Included is the hard to find \\\\\\\"Tonight and Forever\\\\\\\" by the Damnwells / Alex Dezen featured in the movie Chaos Theory. 

There is currently there is no available studio version of the song used in the movie. we are all patiently awaiting a soundtrack. In the mean time, unzip the file for the show from Nov \\\\\\\&#039;05 where Alex and guitarist David Chernis of The Damnwells performed this song live. Please feel free to listen to it in order to tide you over until the soundtrack\\\\\\\&#039;s release.

Also included is the song \\\\\\\"Say\\\\\\\" also featured in the movie Chaos Theory, \\\\\\\"Say\\\\\\\" can be found in the \\\\\\\"Demos / Other\\\\\\\" file. A live version of \\\\\\\"Say\\\\\\\" is also available in the Alex Solo acoustic show from Oct. 07

After you listen, go out and buy their CD\\\\\\\&#039;s and support this amazing band!


Files in chronological Order (newest at the bottom)
